author: Max Boot
title: The only official fired over the virus? A captain who tried to protect his crew. - The Washington Post
description: The only official fired over the virus? A captain who tried to protect his crew. The Washington Post Sailors cheer Navy captain removed for coronavirus warning CNN Lawmakers call for investigation into aircraft carrier captain's firing | TheHill The Hill Capt…
content: The U.S. government was fatally ill-prepared for the spread of a pandemic that has killed more Americans over the past month than died in Iraq over the past 17 years. The military could have done more to help but, like other government agencies, it was slow t… [+4533 chars]
